about_the_game:
Experience the ebb and flow of turn based tactics in Athena Crisis guided by this compelling soundtrack written by Naineux. With a rich exploration of different genres and styles over 17 tracks, this immersive score lasting over an hour encapsulates the essence of the game, intertwining powerful melodies and rhythmic beats that synchronize seamlessly with every tactical decision.

The soundtrack is available in MP3 and FLAC.
